body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Douglas Stewart and the customer's name is Susan Hernandez.  The conversation is about a random business (a Yoga Studio ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm here to assist you from Tech Solutions Inc.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, nice to meet you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! To help you better, could you please provide your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Now, could you also tell me your date of birth in the format of month, day, and year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's April fifth, nineteen eighty-six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! I have noted that down. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. Thank you for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're most welcome! Thank you for your time, John. Have a wonderful day!
